title: Bloomberg Law Brief: Silk Road's 'Pirate' Loses Appeal (Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg Law Brief: Silk Road's 'Pirate' Loses Appeal (Audio)
description:
Bob Van Voris, a legal reporter for Bloomberg News, discusses why Manhattan appeals court rejected Ross William Ulbricht's appeal to avoid a life sentence for running the Silk Road online drug bazaar. He speaks with June Grasso and Greg Stohr on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
